alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Noble; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON...GUERNSEY... COSHOCTON...MUSKINGUM...TUSCARAWAS AND NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Glenmont to near Dresden to 9 miles north of Glouster. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, New Philadelphia, Dover, Coshocton, Cambridge, Caldwell, Newcomerstown, Strasburg, New Concord, Byesville, West Lafayette, and Sugarcreek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 195. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Noble; Tuscarawas
